001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
004import java.util.HashMap;
005import java.util.Map;
006import java.util.Objects;
007
008/**
009 * Provides an abstract base class for managing UI component services.
010 *
011 * <p>This class serves as a generic service layer for handling UI components of various types.
012 * It maintains a registry of component instances and ensures efficient reuse.
013 *
014 * <p>Implementing classes must define how components are created based on a {@link ComponentType}.
015 * The component type is represented by {@code T}, which is an enumeration implementing {@link ComponentType},
016 * and the actual UI component implementation is represented by {@code C}.
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020public abstract class AbstractComponentService<T extends ComponentType, C> {
021
022   /**
023    * The {@code SmartWebDriver} instance used for UI interactions.
024    */
025   protected final SmartWebDriver driver;
026
027   /**
028    * A registry that stores component instances mapped to their types.
029    */
030   protected final Map<T, C> components;
031
032   /**
033    * Constructs an {@code AbstractComponentService} with the given WebDriver.
034    *
035    * @param driver The {@code SmartWebDriver} instance used for component interactions.
036    * @throws NullPointerException if the provided driver is {@code null}.
037    */
038   protected AbstractComponentService(SmartWebDriver driver) {
039      this.driver = Objects.requireNonNull(driver, "Driver must not be null");
040      this.components = new HashMap<>();
041   }
042
043   /**
044    * Retrieves a component instance for the specified type.
045    *
046    * <p>If a component of the given type does not exist, it is created and stored.
047    *
048    * @param componentType The type of component to retrieve.
049    * @return The corresponding UI component instance.
050    */
051   protected C getOrCreateComponent(T componentType) {
052      return components.computeIfAbsent(componentType, this::createComponent);
053   }
054
055   /**
056    * Creates a new UI component instance for the specified type.
057    *
058    * <p>Subclasses must provide an implementation to initialize components of type {@code C}.
059    *
060    * @param componentType The type of component to create.
061    * @return The newly created UI component instance.
062    */
063   protected abstract C createComponent(T componentType);
064
065}
